thread.title: 3D Platform on open market advantages for large format 3D printing
thread.title_full: 3D Platform on open market advantages for large format 3D printing

title: 3D Platform on open market advantages for large format 3D printing
text:
3D Platform on open market advantages for large format 3D printing 5 October 2015 Expand TCT catches up with John Good, Vice President of Sales and Marketing at 3D Platform , formerly known as 3DP Unlimited, to talk about some of the changes happening at the large format 3D printing company by leveraging the benefits of open market capabilities and demonstrating how users can combine 3D printed and non-printed products to open up possibilities for even bigger ideas. 
To keep up-to-date on all the latest videos from TCT Show make sure you subscribe to our YouTube channel . Tags
